Class Document

java.lang.Object
  org.grobid.core.document.Document
Direct Known Subclasses:
PatentDocument
public class Document
extends Object

Class for representing, processing and exchanging a document item.

getPdf2xml

protected static String getPdf2xml(boolean full)

pdf2xml

public String pdf2xml(boolean tout,
                      boolean force,
                      int startPage,
                      int endPage,
                      String pdfPath,
                      String tmpPath,
                      boolean full)
               throws Exception
Create an XML representation from a pdf file. If tout is true (default), a timeout is used. If force is true, the xml file is always regenerated, even if already present (default is false, it can save up to 50% overall runtime). If full is true, the extraction covers also images within the pdf, which is relevant for fulltext extraction.

Throws:
Exception

processPdf2XmlThreadMode

protected String processPdf2XmlThreadMode(boolean tout,
                                          String pdfPath,
                                          String tmpPathXML,
                                          String cmd)
Process the conversion of pdf to xml format using thread calling native executable.

Parameters:
tout -
pdfPath - path to pdf
tmpPathXML - temporary path to save the converted file
cmd - arguments to call the executable pdf2xml
Returns:
the path the the converted file.

processPdf2Xml

protected String processPdf2Xml(String pdfPath,
                                String tmpPathXML,
                                String cmd)
                         throws TimeoutException
Process the conversion of pdf to xml format calling native executable. No thread used for the execution.

Parameters:
pdfPath - path to pdf
tmpPathXML - temporary path to save the converted file
cmd - arguments to call the executable pdf2xml
Returns:
the path the the converted file.
Throws:
TimeoutException

getHeaderLastHope

public String getHeaderLastHope()
We return the first page as header estimation... better than nothing when nothing is not acceptable.

getHeaderByIntroduction

public String getHeaderByIntroduction()
We try to match the introduction section in a safe way, and consider if minimum requirements are met the blocks before this position as header.

getBody

public String getBody()
Return the body of the document. getHeader() and getReferences() must have been called before.

getAllBlocksClean

public String getAllBlocksClean(int toIgnore1,
                                int toIgnore2)
Return all blocks without markers.

Ignore the toIgnore1 th blocks and the blocks after toIgnore2 (included)
